scriptment.part:
Cut to church bell, ding four times leading into Get On It. After the fourth ding, start piano riff. NoLifeQueen appears on screen.NoLifeQueen flies past the church bell, through her dress the wind a-blowing.Impressment opportunity. Player hits the ground running. Camera does not follow NoLifeQueen on the way down. Cut to running. Yeah! NoLifeQueen hits the ground running, Clan in tow. Something is amiss — everyone's account passwords are showing directly under their usernames.Bass riff. Game controls camera for a bit.NoLifeQueen, Davis, and their Clans clamor down the cobbled street.And right at the beginning of the chorus, dolly out.Everyone's excited! This is going to be a great time!And then at the end of the bridge—In rushes a bursting blast of blinding steam. Everyone on the roof! Not much better. Player names become garbled. Passwords disappear. Items become invisible. All is obscured from view but friend, foe, and ground. The steam rages on.Have the steam not be there for a few seconds when the player reaches the roof. Items should be present in the area, to show that they are not visible when the steam is around. What was that? Encryption system! It protects user accounts — it's actually better to keep the steam here. We've got to keep the steam going! The steam sporadically disappears, leaving sensitive information out in the open. IP Addresses, SSH public keys, passwords, email addresses — a wrench falls from the sky. Get that wrench and fix the valves! NoLifeQueen reaches for the wrench and an opponent grabs it and runs off. NoLifeQueen chases him!This portion of the level is straightforward: the more fixed valves, the more users. To fix a valve, the player has to go up to one with the wrench and Fix as Main Action. This takes a while. To prevent the player from backtracking, the steam gets incredibly thick and deals damage the further back she goes.
Davis gets the wrench and fixes a valve. NoLifeQueen protects him. Magical Girl, I need a shield! I'll keep you covered!
NoLifeQueen gets the wrench and fixes a valve. Davis protects her. Hold on Dave, I'm turning a wrench. I've got your back.
Everyone makes their way across the rooftops, grabbing wrenches and fixing valves. After a point, the steam becomes so thick that all is obscured. Success! The steam subsides. The two are alone, no longer amongst the area of encryption. Where are we? Davis gasps. He grabs NoLifeQueen.Ramp up the music here. You're grabbing me! Someone's cracking your computer! No, nobodyâ€”
NoLifeQueen breaks free of Davis' grip. She stands, bewildered. Davis is shocked. Yuki, why— Train hits them both.Both lose health, but they remain together. Davis stays in the party.
NoLifeQueen stays in Davis' grip. He throws her into the air. Davis breathes a sigh of relief and train hits him.Only Davis gets hit, only Davis loses health. The two are now separated. NoLifeQueen is alone. Dave, no! Bro!
NoLifeQueen ends up on the roof of the train. She takes a look around. Dolly out extremely far from the train.This train looks like... This is — a loading screen? Telechargement...
Davis and NoLifeQueen are together.Davis looks ahead. There are a lot of users loading the game right now. There's malware up ahead — at 100% loaded, the users are all screwed. A percentage loaded bar appears at the top of the screen. Camera get a look at this bomb. We've gotta stop the train!
NoLifeQueen is alone, resting on the top of the train. What is that? Camera get a look at this bomb. That's a bomb! I've got to stop it!
Davis comes over the microphone-chat. These are all newbies! We can't let these end-users' first experience with The Clan be a crash! Let's try to get into the train.
Player follow Davis to the interior of the train.Davis and NoLifeQueen bust into the train. Every passenger turns and points a gun. What are you doing here? Nobody move! We're trying to— This must be the first battle! Get those guys! Everyone charges after Davis and NoLifeQueen. Davis echoes over the microphone. Don't defeat them — these are potential players. Get to the missile launcher and destroy that bomb! Game's afoot.Train is very fast. Nobody fall off or else dead. The player must enter the train and launch missiles at the bomb in the distance.After destroying the bomb, NoLifeQueen and Davis take a breather. Phew.2 Davis and NoLifeQueen stand tall and then the passengers bust into their cab. There they are! The entire population of passengers defeats NoLifeQueen and Davis. Game Over.
